description.message: Блокира реклами и изкачащи реклами в YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, както и в любимите Ви сайтове.
description.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.

description2.message: Най-популярното разширение за Chrome с над 60 милиона потребители! Блокира реклами в световната мрежа.
description2.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.

name_devbuild.description: Extension name to be shown for development builds. Note: this cannot be longer than 45 characters. Should not be translated
name_devbuild.message: AdBlock версия в процес на разработване

name_releasebuild.description: Extension name to be shown for release / published builds.  The extension name 'AdBlock' should NOT be translated, but the text after the dash should be translated
name_releasebuild.message: AdBlock - Най-добрия в блокирането на реклами

name.description: Extension name to be shown for release / published builds.  The extension name 'AdBlock' should NOT be translated, but the text after the dash should be translated
name.message: AdBlock - Най-добрия в блокирането на реклами

description_edge.message: AdBlock. Блокер на реклами №1 с над 200 милиона изтегляния! Блокира реклами в световната мрежа.
description_edge.description: Description for the AdBlock for Edge extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.

name_adblock_on_youtube.description: Name of version of the AdBlock extension that only blocks ads on YouTube. Other strings that refer to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension should use this name.

adblock_click_for_details.message: Натиснете бутона на AdBlock за подробности
adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button to access more options.

reportpubliclyavailable.message: Забележка: достъпът до доклада може да бъде публичен. Имайте го предвид, ако включвате лични данни.
reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report.

chromebutton_how_to_hide2.message: Щракнете с десен по бутона на AdBlock и изберете „Скрий oт меню Chrome“. За да го покажете, щракнете по меню Chrome, щракнете с десен по бутона на AdBlock и изберете „Пази в лентата“.
chromebutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.

operabutton_how_to_hide2.message: За да го скриете, отворете opera://extensions и отметнете „Скрий от лентата“. Можете да го покажете повторно като я снемете.
operabutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Opera displays on the Extensions page.

safaributton_how_to_hide2.message: За да го скриете, щракнете с десен в лентата на Safari, изберете „Нагласи лентата“ и го изхвърлете с влачене от нея. Можете да го покажете с повторно с влачене към лентата.
safaributton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Customize Toolbar' should match the text that Safari displays in the toolbar's context menu.

ff_button_how_to_hide.message: За да го скриете, щракнете с десен бутон по лентата и изберете „Премахни от лентата“. Можете да го покажете повторно в меню на Firefox -> Нагласи.
ff_button_how_to_hide.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Remove from Toolbar' should match the text that Firefox displays when you right click a toolbar button, and 'Customize' should match the text that shows when you click the button on the Firefox toolbar with three lines.

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklistereditfilter.message: Моля, въведете правилния филтър по-долу и натиснете ДА:
blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter. 'OK' is the standard JavaScript popup button text.

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Alert if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the 'Block an ad' wizard.

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that nothing will be blocked.

blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Внимание: филтърът блокира всички елементи $elementtype$ в страницата!
blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked.

blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found

blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found

blacklisterattrwillbe.description: Checkbox label for attributes in 'Block an ad' wizard.

buttonlooksgood.description: Confirmation button after user chose what to block on the page

findingads.message:
Намиране на реклами…

Ще отнеме момент.

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.message: AdBlock няма да се изпълнява в страници, съвпадащи с:
adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the allowlist wizard will allowlist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.

you_can_slide_to_change.message: Движете плъзгача до включване на страниците, за които AdBlock няма да се изпълнява.
you_can_slide_to_change.description: allowlist slider usage instructions. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the allowlist wizard (Don't run on this page/pages on this domain)

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the allowlist wizard

subscribeconfirm.message: Сигурен ли сте, че се абонирате за филтъра „$title$“?
subscribeconfirm.description: Prompt question before subscribing to a filter list

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the Options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the Options page

tabcustomize.description: A tab on the Options page

generaloptions.description: Title of the first Options page tab

mac_app_message_options.message: AdBlock за Safari е налично като като ап за Mac!
mac_app_message_options.description: Message to users on the Options page

betalabel.description: Label for experimental features in AdBlock Options

showcontextmenus2.message: Добави елементи към контекстното меню (щракване с десен бутон)
showcontextmenus2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page.

safaricontentblocking.message: Разреши блокиране на съдържание в Safari
safaricontentblocking.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page. 'Content Blocking' is the name of a different way of blocking resources introduced in Safari 9.

debuginlogoption.message: Показвай предпроверочните декларации към дневника на Конзола (забавя разширението)
debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

datacollectionoption.message: Събирай анонимно данни с ползваните филтри и сведения с блокираното съдържание в AdBlock
datacollectionoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

updatedtimestamp.description: Label for filter list subscription last updated timestamp

unsubscribedlabel.description: Status label when unselecting a filter list

fetchinglabel.description: Status label when selecting a new filter list

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_con.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Generic filter list download error message.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_che.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Corrupted filter list file.

invalidListUrl.message: Недействителен адрес на филтъра. Той ще бъде изтрит.
invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL

failedtofetchfilter.description: Error alert when subscribing to a filter list

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter list

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Колкото повече филтри ползвате, толкова по-бавно ще работи AdBlock. Ползването на твърде много може да предизвика забиване на браузъра в определени сайтове. Натиснете ДА за абониране въпреки всичко.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.message: AdBlock няма да блокира реклами, ако забраните всички филтри. Препоръчва се да задържите AdBlock. Прекратяване на абонамента въпреки всичко?
unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to unsubscribe from all filter lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the Filter lists tab of the Options page

filterlistlink.message: Не се абонирайте за повече, отколкото са ви необходими — всеки нов ще ви забавя малко повече! Признания и допълнителни филтри ще намерите [[тук]].
filterlistlink.description: Filter lists tab explanation and link to filter list credits.

filterviewsource.description: Title for links to view filter lists on website

updatenowmessage2.message: Обновяванията се извличат автоматично, но бихте могли да ги [[обновите]] и сега.

orenteraurl.description: Text box to enter a link to a custom filter list

subscribebutton.description: Subscribe to a filter list button

showlinkstolists2.description: Label to display filter list links

filterantisocial.message: Разреши противосоциалния филтър (чисти бутоните на социални мрежи)

filterannoyances.message: Разреши Annoyances от Fanboy (премахва досадни неща)

filterwarning_removal.message: Разреши противоадблоковия филтър (чисти предупрежденията за блокери на реклами)
filterwarning_removal.description: A filter list. "Adblock" is written with a lowercase B in this string as it refers to ad blocking extensions in general, not just AdBlock specifically.

filterrussian.description: Language names for a filter list

filter_russian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_czech.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_indonesian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filterbitcoin_mining_protection.message: Разреши защитата от добив на криптовалута (биткоин)

filter_latvian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

blacklistclickmessage.message: Щракнете с десен по реклама в страницата, за да я блокирате или я блокирайте тук наръка.
blacklistclickmessage.description: 'Hide a section of a webpage' part on the Customize tab of the Options page.

tabcustomizetitle.description: Title of the Customize tab of the Options page

filterlistsrock.message: Филтрите блокират повечето реклами в мрежата. Можете също така:
filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab

linkunblock.message: Показване на реклами в страница или домейн

blockurlwithtext.description: Message of the URL-blocking section (Block an ad by its URL) on the Customize tab

csstomatch.description: Message of the CSS-hiding section (Hide a section of a webpage) on the Customize tab

excludedomainorurl.message: Домейн или адрес, за които AdBlock не блокира нищо:
excludedomainorurl.description: Message of the exclude section (Show ads on a webpage or domain) on the Customize tab

blockdomain.description: Message of the URL and CSS blocking sections

manualfilteredit_yt.description: Subtitle on the 'General' tab of AdBlock on YouTube

migration_error_message.message: Налице са грешки в потребителските филтри. Вижте съобщенията по-долу.
migration_error_message.description: Error when adding custom filters manually

delete_migration_error_messages.description: Button to delete error messages when adding custom filters manually

adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

adreportintro.message: Открихте реклама в страницата? Нека ви помогнем да я докладвате на правилното място!
adreportintro.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page

adreportvoluntary.message: Докладването е доброволно. Така помагате и на другите, защото позволявате доброволецът, поддържащ конкретния филтър, да я блокира за всички. Но ако не сте настроен алтруистично, всичко е наред. Затворете тази страница и [[блокирайте рекламата]] само за себе си.
adreportvoluntary.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page

disableaa.description: Section header on the ad report page

aamessageadreport.message: Ако не желаете да виждате реклами като тази, вероятно ще оставите филтър Приемливи реклами изключен.
aamessageadreport.description: Acceptable Ads message on ad report page

aalinkadreport.description: Acceptable Ads link message on ad report page

adreportthanks.description: Message to the user thanking them for sharing the URL with us.

updateyourlists.message: Уверете се, че филтрите са обновени:
updateyourlists.description: Section header on the ad report page

yes.description: A positive response to a question

no.description: A negative response to a question

adalreadyblocked.description: On the ad report page, telling the user there is nothing to do as the ad they were seeing is now blocked.

clickdisableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, an alternative way to disable other extensions

disableotherextensionscomplete.message: Всички други разширения са забранени. Предстои презареждане на страницата с рекламата. Само секунда, моля.
disableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions

enableotherextensionscomplete.message: Забранените досега разширения са повторно разрешени.
enableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've re-enabled extensions that were previously disabled

manuallyenableotherextensions.message: Отворете страницата с разширения и разрешете забранените досега разширения.
manuallyenableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that they will need to manually reenable the extensions

tabreloadcomplete.message: Готово! Страницата с рекламата е презаредена. Моля, прегледайте я дали е изчезнала. После се върнете тук и отговорете на въпроса по-долу.
tabreloadcomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions

disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.message: Снемете отметките пред разширенията без тази пред AdBlock. Оставете AdBlock разрешено.
disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions

disableforedgestepone.message: Щракнете по меню Още (...) и изберете Разширения.

disableforedgesteptwo.message: За всяко разширение без AdBlock, щракайки по иконата със зъбно колело, поставете бутона ВКЛ в позиция ИЗКЛ.

reenableadsonebyone.message: Чудесно! А сега нека определим разширението, което я допуска. Проверете всяко, разрешавайки само по едно от тях. Това, което я върне, е онова, което трябва да бъде премахнато, за да се отървете от рекламите.
reenableadsonebyone.description: Tells the user to re-enable the extensions one by one

correctfilters.message: Уверете се, че ползвате правилния филтър за езика:
correctfilters.description: On the ad report page, label describing having the right filter lists enabled

filter_easylist_plus_bulgarian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_chinese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_dutch.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_french.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_german.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_israeli.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_italian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_romanian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_arabic_plus_french.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_lithuania.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filtereasylist_plus_vietnamese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_vietnamese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

nodefaultfilter1.message:
Не предлагаме филтър по подразбиране за езика.
Моля, [[сам намерете подходящия за езика]] или блокирайте рекламата самостоятелно през менюто на AdBlock.
nodefaultfilter1.description: Instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list.

retryaftersubscribe.message: Абонирайте се за филтри, след което опитайте отново: $list_title$
retryaftersubscribe.description: Instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox

checkinfirefoxorchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad

checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.message: Инсталирайте Firefox или Chrome, ако го нямате.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox or Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_2.message: Инсталирайте Adblock Plus за Firefox, ако го нямате.
checkinfirefox_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.

checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.message: Инсталирайте Adblock Plus за Firefox или AdBlock за Chrome, ако го нямате.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.

checkinfirefox_3.message: Абонирайте се за същите филтри и в този браузър.
checkinfirefox_3.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_4.message: Заредете страницата с рекламата в браузъра.
checkinfirefox_4.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

checkinfirefox_5.message: Продължавате ли да я виждате в браузъра?
checkinfirefox_5.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Chrome

ff_checkinchrome_1.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_2.message: Инсталирайте AdBlock за Chrome, ако го нямате.
ff_checkinchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_3.message: Абонирайте се за същите филтри в Chrome.
ff_checkinchrome_3.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_4.message: Заредете страницата с рекламата в Chrome.
ff_checkinchrome_4.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

ff_checkinchrome_5.message: Продължавате ли да я виждате в Chrome?
ff_checkinchrome_5.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad

refusetocheck.description: User is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us

reportfilterlistproblem.message: Това е неизправност на филтъра. Докладвайте я на: $link$
reportfilterlistproblem.description: Telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer

link.example: The link could point to a filter list's forum, or to the email address of a filter list maintainer. For example, forums.lanik.us or someguy@list.com.

fixityourself.message: ДОБРЕ, можете да я блокирате самостоятелно в страницата с настройки. Благодарим!
fixityourself.description: Telling users who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for themselves

block_this_ad.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

close.description: Generic message for buttons that close a view or window

loading.description: Generic message displayed during processes that take some time

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in Firefox

cantblockflashwarning.message: Показва ли се рекламата във или преди филм или друг плъгин, като флаш игра?
cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question

cantblockflash.message: Все още не блокираме реклами, съдържащи се във флаш или в други плъгини. Чакаме такава поддръжка да се появи в браузъра и в WebKit.
cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question

cleanuplist2.description: Label at the bottom of the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

disabled_by_filter_lists.message: За съжаление, AdBlock е забранен за страницата в някой от вашите филтри.
disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to un-allowlist a web page that has been allowlisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list.

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Не изпълнявай за страници от домейна
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the allowlist wizard

disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been allowlisted

disabled_on_this_channel.description: Message shown in the toolbar button menu on YouTube channel pages and videos that have been allowlisted.

enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-allowlist a page, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is disabled on this page'

enable_adblock_on_this_channel.description: Menu entry to un-allowlist a YouTube channel, displayed under 'You allowed ads on this channel.'

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running

status_universal_paused.message: AdBlock е задържан за всички сайтове.
status_universal_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running on all domains

resume_blocking_ads.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused on this site' or 'AdBlock is paused on all sites'

unpause_adblock.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused'

domain_unpause_adblock.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused on this site'

pause_adblock.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock (stop blocking ads)

pause_adblock_everywhere.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock everywhere (stop blocking ads)

domain_pause_adblock.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock on this domain (stop blocking ads)

unpause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to unpause the extension (start blocking ads again)

pause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to pause the extension (stop blocking ads)

safaricontentblockingpausemessage.message: За задържане на AdBlock при разрешено блокиране на съдържание, моля, изберете Safari (от менюто) > Настройки > Разширения > AdBlock и снемете отметката пред „Разреши AdBlock“.
safaricontentblockingpausemessage.description: Alert displayed after clicking 'Pause AdBlock' in the AdBlock menu while Safari Content blocking is enabled.

safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.message: Надхвърляте ограничението от 50 000 правила и броят им автоматично беше намален. Моля, прекратете абонамента си за някои от филтрите или забранете блокиране на съдържание в Safari!
safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.description: Displayed when the number of rules in the subscribed filter lists is larger than the number supported by Safari Content Blocking, if that option is enabled.

browserestartrequired.message: Моля, пуснете повторно Safari, за да завърши изключването на блокирането на съдържание.
browserestartrequired.description: Displayed after disabling Safari Content Blocking, which requres a browser relaunch.

safarinotificationtitle.message: Надхвърлена квота към блокиране на съдържание
safarinotificationtitle.description: Title of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules.

safarinotificationbody.message: Моля, забранете някои от филтрите. За повече вж. Настройки на AdBlock.
safarinotificationbody.description: Body of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules.

undo_last_block.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blocklist wizard.

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to allowlist the current page

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://chrome/extensions that takes you to the Options page

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

donate_to_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu

help_and_feedback.description: Text of a help link in the toolbar button menu

donate_to_youtube_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu. 'This' refers to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

pwyw.description: Text of a payment request link

translator_credit.description: This message will be followed by a list of names of the translators who contributed to the language AdBlock is currently displayed in. Do not add any names to this string.

tabsupport.description: A tab on the Options page

tabtranslations.description: A tab on the Options page

translators.message: Как да помогнете в превода на AdBlock [[повече тук]]
translators.description: A link on the Options page / translators tab to a KB article about how to help translate AdBlock

report_ad_on_page.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

troubleshoot_an_ad.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

acceptableadsoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page to enable the Acceptable Ads filter list

advanced_options2.message: Показвай разширените настройки (аз съм опитен потребител)
advanced_options2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

work_around_hulu_problems.message: Ползвай заобиколен начин за нетръгващи клипове от Hulu.com (след повторен пуск на браузъра)
work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.

modifydomain.description: Caption for the allowlist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

modifypath.description: Caption for the allowlist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

show_ads_except_for.message: Показване на реклами навсякъде без домейна
show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for the allowlisting section of Customize tab

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Блокиране на реклами само за сайтовете:
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab

warning_overrules_filters.message:
Внимание: във всички други сайтове ще виждате реклами!
Настройката заобикаля всички останали филтри за сайтовете.
warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a allowlist filter for all websites with only some exceptions.

storage_quota_exceeded.message: Надхвърляте квотата, която AdBlock ползва за съхраняване на данни. Моля, прекратете абонамента си за някои от филтрите!
storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser.

firefox_explanation.message: Въпросът определя кой трябва да получи вашия доклад. Ако отговорите неправилно, докладът ви ще получат неподходящите хора и може да не бъде взет под внимание.
firefox_explanation.description: Explanation of the 'Check in Firefox or Chrome' step on the ad report page

mac_app_message_menu_part_one.description: part one of the message to safari users on the popup menu

mac_app_message_menu_part_two.message: Пробвайте AdBlock като ап за Mac
mac_app_message_menu_part_two.description: part two of the message to safari users on the popup menu

blocked_ads.description: Title for toolbar icon menu section showing number of ads blocked

blocked_n_on_this_page.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked on this page. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999.

blocked_n_in_total.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked since AdBlock was installed. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999.

show_on_adblock_button.message: Показвай броя на блокираните реклами върху бутона на AdBlock
show_on_adblock_button.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

show_on_adblock_menu.message: Показвай броя на блокираните реклами в менюто на AdBlock
show_on_adblock_menu.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked

show_on_button.message: Показвай броя на блокираните реклами върху бутона
show_on_button.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked

show_on_menu.message: Показвай броя на блокираните реклами в менюто
show_on_menu.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked

show_devtools_panel.message: Показвай панел AdBlock към Развойни инструменти
show_devtools_panel.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock tab should be displayed in the developer tools window

adblockinglist.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: List of filter lists to block ads.

otherfilters.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: List of filter lists to block other elements that are not ads.

customfilters.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: Section for adding your own filter lists.

customfilterserrormessage.description: Error message when there is an issue with a custom filter on the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

languagedropdowndescription.description: Dropdown list for language-specific filter lists

how.description: Text of a link pointing to instructions on how to do something

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

selectlanguage.description: First option in the language dropdown menu on the Filter lists tab. Include the ' -- ' on either side of your translation.

confirm_undo_custom_filters.message: Сигурен ли сте, че премахвате $count$ от блокираните елементи за $host$?
confirm_undo_custom_filters.description: Confirmation message when user wants to undo their custom blocks for a domain. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999, $host$ will be the domain where the custom blocks will be reset.

adblocksupport.description: Title of the Support tab of the Options page

englishonly.description: Lets the user know that a link/page is only available in English.

whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. This section contains links to the AdBlock source code and contributors. In this context, 'tick' can be replaced with the word 'work'.

supportsite.message: Споделете ги в нашия [[сайт за поддръжка]]!
supportsite.description: Link to the support site on the Support tab

headerresource.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headertype.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headerfilter.description: Resource list page: title of a column

show_resourcelist.description: Menu entry to open the resource list page

new_resourcelist_explanation_win.message: Щракнете с десен в страницата, изберете „Обследвай“ (Ctrl+Shift+I) и отворете раздел AdBlock.
new_resourcelist_explanation_win.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+ (Windows)

new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.message: Щракнете с десен в страницата, изберете „Обследвай“ (⌥+⌘+I) и отворете раздел AdBlock.
new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+ (Mac)

noresourcessend2.message: Нещо се обърка. Не са изпращани никакви ресурси. Сега страницата ще се затвори. Опитайте да презаредите сайта.

resourcedomain.description: Resource list page: text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

filterorigin.description: Resource list page: tooltip of matching filter, telling which filter list contains the filter

list.example: A filter list name OR AdBlock OR the translation of 'tabcustomize'

frametype.description: Resource list page: followed by frame type (top frame, subframe)

framedomain.description: Resource list page: domain name of the frame

frameurl.description: Resource list page: full URL of the frame

legend.description: Resource list page: followed by color codes for various resource statuses (blocked, allowlisted, hidden)

thirdparty.description: Resource list page: column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

acceptableadsdisable_done.message: Абонаментът ви за Приемливи реклами е прекратен.
acceptableadsdisable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via the Options page.

acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.message: Можете да го включите в подкрепа на любимите си сайтовете пак, като по-долу изберете „Позволи определени ненатрапчиви реклами“.
acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via the Options page.

easylist_lite_or_easylist.message: Абонирайте се или за „EasyList Lite“, или за „EasyList“, но не и за двата едновременно.
easylist_lite_or_easylist.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_disable_done.message: AdBlock ползва EasyList за блокиране на реклами в повечето сайтове.
easylist_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.message: Препоръчва се го запазите. Ако абонаментът е прекратен неволно, моля, изберете „EasyList“ пак, за да блокирате повече реклами.
easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_lite_disable_done.message: AdBlock ползва EasyList Lite или EasyList за блокиране на реклами в повечето сайтове.
easylist_lite_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

easylist_lite_disable_how_to_reenable.message: препоръчва се да го запазите. Ако абонаментът е прекратен неволно, моля, изберете „EasyList Lite“ или „EasyList“ пак, за да блокирате повечето реклами.
easylist_lite_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.

acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.message: Абонаментът за Приемливи реклами е прекратен, защото включихте блокиране на съдържание в Safari. По едно и също време можете да разрешите или едното, или другото. ([[Защо?]])
acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.description: Warning shown when Safari Content Blocking is enabled while the Acceptable Ads filter list was already enabled.

content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.message: Блокирането на съдържание в Safari изключи, защото избрахте ненатрапчиви реклами. По едно и също време можете да разрешите или едното, или другото. ([[Защо?]])
content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.description: Warning shown when the Acceptable Ads filter list is enabled while Safari Content Blocking was already enabled.

adreport_laststep.message: Последна стъпка: докладвайте я на нас.
adreport_laststep.description: Subtitle on the ad report page. Shown when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock, and not filter list maintainers.

adreport_name.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their name (or nickname) to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_email.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their email address to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_email_privacy.message: Ще я използваме, само ако трябва да се свържем с вас за повече информация.
adreport_email_privacy.description: Let the user know that their email address won't be used for reasons other than contacting them about their bug or ad report.

adreport_location.message: Къде точно е рекламата в страницата? И как изглежда?
adreport_location.description: Question on the ad report page asking the user to describe the ad and its location on a webpage.

adreport_screen_cap_upload.description: Label next to a file upload button.

adreport_filter.message: В случай на създаден от вас филтър чрез съветника за блокиране на реклама, моля, поставете го в полето по-долу:
adreport_filter.description: Optional question on the ad report page when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock.

adreport_missing_info.message: Важни сведения липсват или са непълни. Моля, отговорете на въпросите, оградени в червено.
adreport_missing_info.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't enter anything in some of the text fields.

adreport_missing_screenshot.message: Забравихте да прикачите снимка на екрана! Няма да сме в състояние да ви помогнем, без да видим докладваната реклама.
adreport_missing_screenshot.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't attach a screenshot to an ad report.

adreport_response_success.message: Всичко е настроено! Ще се свържем веднага щом можем. Междувременно проверете за е-писмо от AdBlock. В него ще намерите препратка към вашия билет в нашия помощен сайт заедно с определени предложения за самопомощ, в случай че не успеем да ви отговорим веднага.
adreport_response_success.description: Shown when a ticket has been sumbitted to AdBlock's support site successfully.

adreport_response_invalid_file.message: Файлът не е изображение. Моля, качете .png, .gif или .jpg.
adreport_response_invalid_file.description: Error message shown when the user uploads an invalid file type.

adreport_response_large_file.message: Твърде голям файл. Моля, уверете се, че вашият файл е под 10 МБ.
adreport_response_large_file.description: Error message shown when the user tries to upload a large image file.

adreport_response_save_error.message: Грешка при записване на качения файл.
adreport_response_save_error.description: Error message shown when the server could not save an attached file.

adreport_response_file_name.message: Твърде дълго име на файл. Моля, дайте по-късо име на вашия файл.
adreport_response_file_name.description: Error message shown when the file name of an attachement the user is trying to submit in a report is longer than 255 characters.

adreport_all_debug_info.message: Следните сведения ще бъдат включени към доклада за реклама.
adreport_all_debug_info.description: Shows the user the debug information that will be sent along with their report.

adreport_server_response_error_msg.message: Възникна грешка при обработване на вашата заявка.
adreport_server_response_error_msg.description: Error message shown when an new ticket is sumbitted for an ad or bug report, and the server had an issue while processing the data.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.message: И там наръка създайте билет, като копирате сведенията и ги поставите в полето под „Fill in any details you think will help us understand your issue“.
adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part one of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.message: Следните съобщения са генерирани при мигриране на потребителския филтър (без да се броят редовете):
custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part two of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated
Part three of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated

show_language_options.message: Позволи да посоча екранния език на AdBlock
show_language_options.description: Option to let the user choose AdBlock's display language.

display_language_selector.description: Text shown before language selector drop-down.

local_cdn_option.message: Разреши местно кеширане на съдържанието за библиотеките на популярни сайтове
local_cdn_option.description: Option to let the user enable Local CDN feature.

myadblockoptions.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Options page

newmyadblockenrollment.description: The text of the 'Enable MyAdBlock' menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Enrollment page

myadblockenrollment.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Enrollment page

myadblockoptionspageheader.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockoptionscategoryheader.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockpicreplacementswitchlabel.message: Замяна на определени блокирани реклами с висококачествени картини от категориите по-долу:
myadblockpicreplacementswitchlabel.description: The label text for the switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

catchannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the cat switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

dogchannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the dog switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

landscapechannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the Landscape switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

urgent_safari_changes.message: СПЕШНО: Apple промени разширенията в Safari.
urgent_safari_changes.description: Title for Options page message letting users know of settings change.

settings_changed.message: Междувременно, AdBlock вече работи по друг начин и някои от вашите настройки вероятно са променени.
settings_changed.description: Part of Options page message letting users know of settings change.

learn_more.description: Link to Knowledge Base article with more information about the settings change

download_mac_app.message: За най-добра работа AdBlock във вашия Mac, моля, изтеглете нашия [[ап за Mac AdBlock за Safari!]]
download_mac_app.description: Link to download our Mac App. [[ and ]] will be replaced with HTML to link to the Mac App Store

note.description: Indicates that the user should take note of the message that follows.

changes_to_adblock.description: Link to Options page with more information about the changes.

new_myadblock_feature_available.message: Натисни тук за да отключиш нови опции!
new_myadblock_feature_available.description: The text in the popup menu item saying there is a new MyAdBlock feature and takes you to the MyAdBlock tab in the option page.

images_coming_soon.description: The text telling MyAdBlock active users that there will be more photos for MyAdBlock.

myadblock_pic_replacemenet_description.message: Замени рекламите със снимки които харесваш
myadblock_pic_replacemenet_description.description: The text briefly describing what the feature does in the MyAdBlock tab in the option page.

myadblock_payment_not_available_title.message: О НЕ! Не можем да се свържем с нашите сървъри
myadblock_payment_not_available_title.description: The title of an error message box in the MyAdBlock tab in option page when we cannot load iframe.

myadblock_payment_not_available_text.message: Много се радваме че се интересувате от MyAdBlock! За съжаление не можем да обработваме плащания в момента. Моля опитайте по-късно.
myadblock_payment_not_available_text.description: The text of an error message box in the MyAdBlock tab in option page when we cannot load iframe.

myadblock_options_page_header.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblock_picreplacement_exlained.message: Избери от категориите по-долу и AdBlock евентуално ще смени рекламите с висококачествени снимки, за да развесели вашия ден.
myadblock_picreplacement_exlained.description: The label text for the switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblock_feedback_title.message: Ще се радваме да ни пишете!
myadblock_feedback_title.description: Title for MyAdBlock feedback call to action.

myadblock_feedback_info.message: Ако искате да споделите нещо или да предложите подобрение, моля използвайте страницата за обратна връзка.
myadblock_feedback_info.description: Text describing the MyAdBlock feedback call to action.

myadblock_feedback_button.description: Text on the MyAdBlock feedback button

error_msg_thank_you.description: The text on the popup menu when an error has occurred

generaloptions2.description: Title of one of the Options page tabs

debuginlogoption2.message: Покажи отстраняването на грешки в конзолата
debuginlogoption2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page

slows_down_extension.description: Text of an option telling users that the option slows down the extension

enter_url.description: Placeholder text in the Custom Filter list URL bar

filter_annoyances_explained.message: блокира изкачащи прозорци вътре в страницата, притурки на социалните медии и др. дразнители

filterwarning_removal2.message: Adblock Списък за Премахване на Предупреждения
filterwarning_removal2.description: A filter list. "Adblock" is written with a lowercase B in this string as it refers to ad blocking extensions in general, not just AdBlock specifically.

filter_warning_removal_explained.message: премахва предупреждения относно употребата на програми блокиращи реклами

filterlistsrock2.message: Списъка с филтри блокира повечето реклами в интернет. Можете също...
filterlistsrock2.description: Header text on the Customize tab

filtersavewarning_part1.message: Внимателно: Ако направиш грешка тук, много други филтри, включително официалните може да спрат да работят!
filtersavewarning_part1.description: Warning when manually editing filters -- first part not clickable.

pwyw2.description: Text of a payment request link

translator_credit2.description: This message will be followed by a list of names of the translators who contributed to the language AdBlock is currently displayed in. Do not add any names to this string.

selectlanguage2.description: First option in the language dropdown menu on the Filter lists tab.

require_restart_browser.description: Text displayed within an option to notify users to restart the browser to fully enable the option

themes.description: Title of the Themes tab of the Options page

popup_menu_theme.description: Section title of the Themes tab of the Options page

myadblock_more_coming_soon.description: Title of the teaser MyAdBlock feature box in the MyAdBlock tab of the Options page

sync_message_old_version_part_1.message: Вие използвате стара версия на AdBlock.
sync_message_old_version_part_1.description: button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page

sync_message_old_version_part_2.message: Моля [[обновете AdBlock]], така че да можем да синхронизираме вашите настройки.
sync_message_old_version_part_2.description: button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page

sync_premium_cta.message: Ще бъдете експерт в блокирането на реклами с Premium услугите, като Синхронизиране.
sync_premium_cta.description: AdBlock Premium CTA on the Sync tab

backup_sync_settings.message: Автоматично запазвай и синхронизирай твоите AdBlock настройки на всичките Ви устройства.
backup_sync_settings.description: Description of Sync on Sync tab

set_preferences_once.message: Настрой своите предпочитания и не се тревожи за загуба на данни или да правиш същите настройки някога отново.
set_preferences_once.description: Description of Sync on Sync tab

get_sync.description: Link to pay for Sync (part of AdBlock Premium)

check_sync_status.description: Button on Sync tab that checks the status of the Sync feature

show_details.description: Toggle that shows the details section

hide_details.description: Toggle that hides the details section

add_this_extension.description: Button on Sync tab that adds this extension to the Sync process

add.description: Button on Sync tab that adds an entered name for this extension to the list of synced extensions

this_extension.description: description for name of the current extension

confirm_delete_extension.message: Сигурен ли си че искаш да изтриеш разширението?
confirm_delete_extension.description: Warning/confirmation message shown when the user clicks on the delete icon for a device

acceptable_ads_privacy.message: Позволявай само реклами без проследяване от трети страни
acceptable_ads_privacy.description: The text of an Acceptable Ads sub-option in the General tab

enable_do_not_track_advice.message: За да работи правилно тази услуга, моля включете Do Not Track (DNT) от настройките на вашия браузър.
enable_do_not_track_advice.description: The text advicing to enable DNT if Acceptable Ads is enabled in the General tab

devtools_action_block.description: Button text on the dev tools panel.

devtools_action_remove.description: Button text on the dev tools panel.

devtools_action_unblock.description: Button text on the dev tools panel.

devtools_filter_origin_custom.description: sub-title text of the rule showing the source of the rule as custom rules

devtools_filter_origin_none.description: sub-title text of the rule showing the source of the rule as a unamed filter list

devtools_filter_subtitle.description: sub-title text of the rule showing the source of the rule a named filter list

devtools_filter_title.description: Text of the filter that was applied to the list item.

devtools_footer.description: message on the bottom of the panel
devtools_footer.message: <a0>Презареди</a0> страницата, за да видите ефекта от промяната на филтъра

devtools_header.description: Text on the top of the dev tools panel to show all items of any type; slot0 and slot1 are two seperate drop down lists

devtools_header_state_all.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_header_state_blocked.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_header_type_any.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_request_subtitle.description: sub title text for the request-column header of the dev tools panel

devtools_request_title.description: title text for the request-column header of the dev tools panel

devtools_request_url.description: A request URL in the AdBlock DevTools panel

new_badge.description: Max 4 characters. If it's not possible to translate in four characters or less, please don't translate. Text in the badge of our extension toolbar icon.

new_cta_default_text.description: Text of a temporary call-to-action item in the popup menu.

new_cta_hovered_text.description: Text of a temporary call-to-action hovered item in the popup menu.

myadblock_page_title.message: MyAdBlock: По-добър начин да сърфирате в интернет.
myadblock_page_title.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblock_short_description_to_pay.message: Ще бъдете експерт в блокирането на реклами с тези лесни за употреба добавки към браузъра.
myadblock_short_description_to_pay.description: The text next to the 'Get It Now' button on top of the MyAdBlock Options page

get_it_now.description: The text in a button visible to locked users in the MyAdBlock Options page

make_adblock_yours_title.description: The title of a feature box in the MyAdBlock Options page

make_adblock_yours_description.message: Ти контролираш как да изглежда и как да се усеща. Големината на шрифта е лесна за контрол с AdBlock.
make_adblock_yours_description.description: The main text of a feature box in the MyAdBlock Options page

see_photos_no_ads_title.description: The title of a feature box in the MyAdBlock Options page

see_photos_no_ads_description.message: Продължаваме да блокираме реклами, но сега ще заменим някои от тях с красиви снимки на котки, кучета и природа.
see_photos_no_ads_description.description: The main text of a feature box in the MyAdBlock Options page

sync_your_settings_title.description: The title of a feature box in the MyAdBlock Options page

how_can_we_help.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

see_ad.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

website_broken.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

dont_know_help_me.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

first_time_seeing_ad.message: Това е първия път в който виждат тази реклама
first_time_seeing_ad.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

ok.description: Message for help flow in popup menu.

help.description: Text in the aria-label attribute of the support icon on the pop-up menu.

settings.description: Text in the aria-label attribute of the gear icon on the pop-up menu.

error.description: Text in the aria-label attribute of an icon indicating an error occurred.

selected.description: Text in the aria-label attribute of an icon showing an option is selected.

learn_more_without_period.description: Text in the aria-label attribute of an icon linking to extra information about an option.

update_filter_lists_now.description: Text in the aria-label attribute of the 'update now' button on the Options page in the Filter Lists tab.

popup_menu.description: General text used to define the pop-up menu.

options_page.description: General text used to define the extension options page.

adblock_will_pause_on_this_site.message: Ако го натиснеш AdBlock ще спре да блокира реклами на този сайт.
adblock_will_pause_on_this_site.description: Second sentence in the aria-label of the pop-up menu action to pause blocking ads on this site.

pause_on_all_sites.description: First sentence in the aria-label of the pop-up menu action to pause blocking ads on all sites.

adblock_will_pause_on_all_sites.message: Ако го натиснеш AdBlock ще спре да блокира реклами на всички сайтове.
adblock_will_pause_on_all_sites.description: Second sentence in the aria-label of the pop-up menu action to pause blocking ads on all sites.

adblock_will_block_ads_again.message: Ако го натиснеш AdBlock отново ще блокира реклами.
adblock_will_block_ads_again.description: Second sentence in the aria-label of the pop-up menu action to resume blocking ads.

resume_blocking_ads_period.description: First sentence in the aria-label of the pop-up menu action to resume blocking ads.

do_not_swap_ads.description: Text of a clickable option to stop swapping ads with images in the Options page Image Swap tab.

premium.description: Abbreviated name of the AdBlock upgrade.

adblock_premium.description: Full name of the AdBlock upgrade.

premium_page_title.message: AdBlock Premium: По-добър начин за сърфиране в интернет.
premium_page_title.description: The text of the header the AdBlock Premium Options page

premium_benefits_explained.message: В замяна на това че ни подкрепяте като включите AdBlock Premium, ще имате достъп до последните инструменти и услуги веднага щом бъдат пуснати.
premium_benefits_explained.description: Main text of the teaser AdBlock Premium feature in the AdBlock Premium tab of the Options page

manage_subscription.description: Text of link to manage the user's Premium subscription on the Premium tab of the Options page

save_custom_settings_cta.message: Искате ли да запазите персоналните настройки за блокиране на реклами и да ги използвате във всеки браузър?
save_custom_settings_cta.description: Part 1 of a Premium call-to-action on the Options page

try_backup_sync.message: Ако е така, опитайте услугата Запазване & Синхронизиране.
try_backup_sync.description: Part 2 of a Premium call-to-action on the Options page

wont_show_again.message: Добре, повече няма да Ви показваме това съобщение.
wont_show_again.description: Message shown when user opts out of call-to-action

check_out_premium.message: Ако искате да разберете повече, прегледайте [[Premium]].
check_out_premium.description: Part 2 of message shown when user opts out of call-to-action

future_show_ads.message: В бъдеще тези страници ще продължат да показват реклами.
future_show_ads.description: Part of a message on the allowlist wizard

change_behavior_settings.message: Може да промените това поведение от [[settings]].
change_behavior_settings.description: Part of a message on the allowlist and blocklist wizards

never_lose_settings.message: Приложи тези настройки на всички устройства и се увери че няма да загубиш настройките на AdBlock с услугата Запазване & Синхронизиране.
never_lose_settings.description: Part 2 of a call-to-action on the allowlist and blocklist wizards
